subject: Add documentation for demo, production, and technical decisions
body:
- DEMO_CHECKLIST.md: Setup needed before demoing (OAuth test users)
- PRODUCTION_CHECKLIST.md: Launch requirements checklist
- TECHNICAL_DECISIONS.md: Open architecture investigations
- Note: OAuth testing mode has 100 user lifetime limit

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add documentation for demo, production, and technical decisions
